name: PowerCenter:Avoid letting default memory size for complex transformations
description: List all transformations with caching enabled and a default value in memory size for lookup, joiner, aggregator, sorter and rank transformations
output:
This report lists all Mappings, Mapplets and Folders with complex Transformations having default memory size.
it provides the following information
Mapping or Mapplet or Folder full name, Transformation full name
rationale:
Complex transformations (lookup, joiner, aggregator, sorter and rank) with important data volume require specific sizing of their memory. 
It's important and common to adapt the size of the memory to the transformation type, number of processed rows, number of aggregate fields, etc.
remediation: Replace default "Auto" or old (before 8.1.1) default memory values for complex transformation with volume by a calculation made by the Cache Calculator.
total: Total number of Workflows, Worklets, Mappings and Mapplets having complex transformations
